data.title: Cotton University: Courses, Facilities
data.meta_description: Get complete details on Cotton University courses, facilities, latest updates and campus details.
data.text:
Placements & Internships : There is a placement cell in our university. Alumni network is very good. Overall everything is good. But have not much knowledge about key companies.

Entrance Exams & Admissions : Eligibility for Recruitment is class 12 pass. Typical cut offs a

Placements & Internships : There is a placement cell in our university. Alumni network is very good. Overall everything is good. But have not much knowledge about key companies.

Entrance Exams & Admissions : Eligibility for Recruitment is class 12 pass. Typical cut offs are 90 or 91. Cut offs change every year.

Placements & Internships : Cotton college became a university few years ago. So, they have almost all facilities but I've never heard about it that companies hire students from here but the university provides a good quality education.

Fees & Scholarships : Fees

Placements & Internships : Cotton college became a university few years ago. So, they have almost all facilities but I've never heard about it that companies hire students from here but the university provides a good quality education.

Fees & Scholarships : Fees for courses are feasible.

Academics & Faculty : Daily routine is quite good and according to the other students the method of teaching is also good.

College Infrastructure & Hostel Facilities : There are many hostels because they have their own and some local buildings used as hostels. Students also can stay in rent besides hostel but it costs more than hostel fee. The food quality is moderate.

Clubs & Associations : There are all the major festivals on campus.

Placements & Internships : ● No internships or stipends done. ● No idea about that. ● No idea about that. ● Alumni consists of eminent personalities.

Placements & Internships : ● No internships or stipends done. ● No idea about that. ● No idea about that. ● Alumni consists of eminent personalities.

Entrance Exams & Admissions : ● The eligibility criteria for my course was about 80% above in my core subjects from (+2) (excluding physical education). And for the admission procedure, an online form was required to be filled up and during the day of the admission, it was required. ● No entrance examination was required. ● The typical cutoff is about 80%, but it varies from course to course.

Fees & Scholarships : ● My BSC course cost me about 7,000. ● There are many scholarship options available for students. ● No idea about that. ● No loans are needed.

Academics & Faculty : ● The daily routine is good, and class timings are satisfactory and classes happen regularly. ● The quality and method of teaching is good. ● The overall experience in college is good.

College Infrastructure & Hostel Facilities : ● There are about 9 hostels, I guess. And no idea about the hostel fees. ● The PGs are good in the area and is satisfactory. ● The food is good, and it costs less. ● They overall infrastructure is satisfactory, although there are scopes of improvement.

Placements & Internships : I'm still in ug first semester so... I don't have any experience about it. But... I've heard that there were seniors who got good packages and some seniors even top IIT examination

Entrance Exams & Admissions : For BSc, the eligibility criter

Placements & Internships : I'm still in ug first semester so... I don't have any experience about it. But... I've heard that there were seniors who got good packages and some seniors even top IIT examination

Entrance Exams & Admissions : For BSc, the eligibility criteria were 50% aggregate in 10+2 with Science and Mathematics. There were no entrance examinations for UG besides there are entrance examinations for pg. There are certain reservations for minorities, As a result, it becomes hard for general students whose percentage is less than 80. The college scenario is good... Good people good air... And if you happen to join sports... Life will be so much better in cotton

Fees & Scholarships : I'm a general student so I didn't get any scholarship from the college There is financial help for students who are unable to clear the admission fees You only need to pay admission fees i.e less than 8000 and no monthly fees.

Academics & Faculty : Class timings are from 9-4 pm. The method of teaching is quite traditional but. The teachers are highly experienced and qualified Teachers are ever ready to help But. They sometimes teach in Assamese which is not understandable because I'm from Nagaland.

College Infrastructure & Hostel Facilities : There are many hostels, both for girls and boys. Food in college is quite cheap and there are two canteens. There are many pg near the college.

Clubs & Associations : Cotton is full of activities I play basketball and I have been provided with good exposure There is also NSS which is very active. College life has been great so far because of the good people around me.
